title: High Power Battery & Motor Bundle - Two Blade
body_html:
The perfect pairing is irresistible! For those considering both the MAX High Power Battery and the High Power Motor, you'll enjoy more power than ever before, with longer runtimes.

Runtime is further increased through the use of the High Power Motor. Because of it's increased power, the use can use less throttle, becoming more efficient, using less battery!

Two Blade Propeller Hub Included.

title: High Power Stator Only
body_html:
This is a replacement or additional STATOR ONLY for the High Power Motor. 
Please see SKU 184 if you require a standard v2 Stator or SKU 207 if you require the full High Power Motor (Rotor and Stator).

This product is for the High Power Motor ONLY. The Standard v2 Motor is shorter.

title: High Power Rotor Only
body_html:
This is a replacement or additional ROTOR ONLY for the High Power Motor. 
Please see SKU 181 if you require a standard v2 Stator or SKU 208 if you require the full High Power Motor (Rotor and Stator).

This product is for the High Power Motor ONLY. The Standard rotor is shorter.

title: Foil Drive MAX High Power Battery
body_html:
The MAX High Power Battery – The Pinnacle of Performance and Technology!

Take your foiling to unprecedented heights with the MAX High Power Battery, the ultimate evolution in our High Power Range, designed exclusively for the Assist MAX System. Utilizing cutting-edge battery technology, this powerhouse packs significantly more capacity into the same compact size as the current MAX Power Battery, just 100g heavier.

MAX Sport: 332.64 Wh
MAX Power: 498.69 Wh
MAX High Power: 594 Wh

That’s over 19% more capacity compared to the MAX Power Battery, giving you longer ride times and more adventures without compromise.

Pair it with the High Power Motor for Maximum Performance!
When combined with the High Power Motor, this battery unlocks the system’s Maximum Boost Mode of +28% (128% throttle). Enjoy unmatched power, extended runtimes, and the ability to push the boundaries of what’s possible.

With 19% added capacity of the Battery, PLUS the added efficiency of the High Power Motor, combined a rider can see up to 40-45% runtime increase!

This battery isn’t just an upgrade—it’s a revolution. Experience the perfect blend of compact design, lightweight construction, and maximum performance to elevate every foiling session.

Step up to the MAX High Power Battery and redefine your foiling potential!
Maximum Boost: The only battery to unlock the full 28% !
Maximum Boost Time: 18 Seconds

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist MAX. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive battery. Click here to learn about lithium battery use, care and storage.

title: Foil Drive High Power Motor
body_html:
Unleash More Power with the High Power Motor Upgrade for Gen2 Foil Drive!

Take your foiling experience to the next level with the High Power Motor, the ultimate upgrade for Gen2 systems. This advanced motor is designed for riders who demand more torque, thrust, and runtime, delivering peak performance without compromising compatibility. Through improved efficiency, riders can experience up to 19% more runtime.

Paired with the MAX High Power Battery, riders gain the 19% added capacity of the battery. This means, with the High power Battery AND the High power Motor, riders can experience 40-45% more runtime!

Key Benefits of the High Power Motor

Unmatched Low-End Torque: Perfect for heavier riders or smaller boards or foils, the High Power Motor delivers effortless take-offs with power to spare.
Longer Runtimes: Thanks to its superior torque, you’ll need less throttle input, giving you significantly extended ride times.
Increased Thrust: Feel the extra push when you need it most—more thrust means more versatility across all foiling disciplines.
Smoother, Quieter Performance: Enjoy a seamless ride with enhanced efficiency and reduced noise. 

Just 10mm longer and 160g heavier than the Standard v2 Motor, the performance gains make it a game-changer despite the larger size. It’s like fine-tuning your wing or board for optimal results!

Note: Hub and Propellers are NOT included

Seamless Compatibility
The High Power Motor is fully compatible with your Gen2 setup, requiring the v2 Removable Cable and v2 Puck. Pair it with a 2 or 3 Blade Propeller, we recommend the 3 blade for maximum performance.

Note: both v2 motors are not compatible with integrated masts. This is under development.

This upgrade isn’t for everyone - lighter riders may not need the extra power - but those who do can experience unparalleled efficiency and versatility. Whether you want a smoother takeoff, longer rides, or simply the best performance available, the High Power Motor is your ticket to the ultimate foiling adventure.

title: High Power Motor Protection Sticker
body_html:
Replacement Sticker for the outer can of the Foil Drive High Power Motor.

The sticker acts as an outer protection for the paint on the motor. If your sticker becomes torn or ripped, it is recommended you replace it to help protect your motor. It is a good idea to ensure the surface of the motor is in good condition before applying a new sticker. If your motor requires some refurbishing head to our Info Centre for options or instructions to do it yourself.

title: Latch Assembly V2 - Assist MAX
body_html:
Replacement Latch Assembly V2 for Assist MAX. These latches have been upgraded with more reinforcement and are made out of a different material to ensure your box remains nice and tight!

If you are replacing V1 MAX Latches, these can be reviewed for Warranty Replacement, please fill in this form prior to purchasing latches.

Submit Latch Claim Here

Note: Initial Batch of V2 Latches are limited, we are expecting to have more available in March 2025. Those with broken latches will be prioritised ahead of those wanting peace of mind replacements.

title: Foil Drive Assist PLUS
body_html:
Foil Drive Assist PLUS is the entry level Foil Drive unit for everyone. The Assist PLUS allows riders the creativity to fit an electric paddle assistance system to their existing gear any way they like. It's lightweight design perfect for foil surfing, downwind, wing foil, learning and flatwater Foil Driving meaning you can focus on flight and improve your foiling in no time.


Simply choose your desired PLUS Battery 

All Assist PLUS kits now come with the maximum 200cm / 78'' cable length as standard as well as Universal Mast Adaptor.
variants_title: PLUS Standard 12.6ah Battery / AU Plug - Type I

title: Foil Drive Slim Endurance Battery & 28v Charger Bundle
body_html:
The Foil Drive Slim Endurance Battery is the larger SLIM battery with 241Wh capacity. The Endurance Battery is great for those who are wanting to lengthen their runtime with the Assist Slim, however, due to the lower voltage this battery does not provide the same level of thrust and overall ride experience as the Slim Performance Battery.

The Slim Endurance Battery is the only Gen2 battery that runs on a 28V system. This means you must use the 28V Standard Charger 4A with this battery. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CHARGE THIS BATTERY WITH A 40V Charger!

YOU MUST READ this Critical Battery Configuration information about the usage of the 28v Slim Endurance battery.

 

As with all Gen2 Foil Drive batteries, the Slim Endurance Battery is certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. 

The single power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust cap provides extra protection during storage & transport.

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist Slim. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive battery. Click here to learn more about lithium battery use, care and storage.

Click here to learn about the differences between our batteries for Gen1 and Gen2.

title: Foil Drive Gen1 Motor
body_html:
Replacement Motor and v1 Puck to suit Foil Drive Assist or Assist PLUS ONLY.

This is for Gen1 Systems Only and is not plug and play.


Motors can be refurbished so please contact us prior to purchase to inspect your existing motor. See Help Centre article here

title: Foil Drive Assist MAX
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist MAX is the flagship model, for the ultimate in hybrid electric assist foiling. As the name suggests, the Assist MAX offers the maximum thrust, run time and versatility! 

The kit includes everything you need to turn your existing hydrofoil and board into an electric assisted foiling machine:

  • Universal Mast Adaptor that suits 99% of foil masts available
  • v2 Motor with 20cm cable length as standard. Cable lengths are easily interchangeable for ultimate customisation with the new Removable V2 Motor Cable
  • Bluetooth Connectivity to the Foil Drive Mobile App

Simply choose your desired battery size between the:

  • MAX Power Battery
  • MAX Sport Battery
  • MAX Travel Battery

 

If you are looking for an integrated mast with your Assist MAX see these listings

  • Foil Drive Assist MAX x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
  • Assist MAX x AXIS Integrated Mast

The Foil Drive Assist MAX is perfectly suited to those looking for extra thrust for heavier riders or smaller boards and foils, longer ride times and ultimate flexibility of how you choose to foil. Surf, Wing, Downwind, Wake and Flatwater, the Assist MAX does it all!

NB: Boards with Carbon Tracks may experience connectivity issues. See our External Antenna

  • v2 Motor with 20cm cable length as standard. Cable lengths are easily interchangeable for ultimate customisation with the new Removable V2 Motor Cable
  • Bluetooth Connectivity to the Foil Drive Mobile App

Simply choose your desired battery size between the:

  • MAX Power Battery
  • MAX Sport Battery
  • MAX Travel Battery

 

If you are looking for an integrated mast with your Assist MAX see these listings

  • Foil Drive Assist MAX x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
  • Assist MAX x AXIS Integrated Mast

The Foil Drive Assist MAX is perfectly suited to those looking for extra thrust for heavier riders or smaller boards and foils, longer ride times and ultimate flexibility of how you choose to foil. Surf, Wing, Downwind, Wake and Flatwater, the Assist MAX does it all!

NB: Boards with Carbon Tracks may experience connectivity issues. See our External Antenna

title: Foil Drive Assist Slim
body_html:
(The Foil Drive Assist Slim is the smaller, lighter, performance orientated model, for the ultimate in performance hybrid electric assist foiling. Despite its small size, it offers the plenty of thrust to get you of foil easier and sooner however the smaller batteries do reduce the run time. The Assist Slim is perfect for advanced, high performance riders or wingers/downwinders that do not require lots of battery capacity.

The kit includes everything you need to turn your existing foil and board into an electric assisted foiling machine:

  • Universal Mast Adaptor that suits 99% of foil masts available
  • v2 Motor with 20cm cable length as standard. Cable lengths are easily interchangeable for ultimate customisation with the new Removable V2 Motor Cable
  • Bluetooth Connectivity to the Foil Drive Mobile App

 

Simply choose your desired battery.

  • Slim Performance Battery (now comes with 2x batteries for the same price!)
  • Slim Endurance Battery (Requires at 28v charger additional purchase!)
  • Slim Travel Battery

If your looking to pair your Assist Slim with an integrated mast, checkout these listings

  • Assist Slim x NoLimitz integrated Mast
  • Assist Slim x Axis Integrated Mast

The Foil Drive Assist Slim is perfectly suited to those just looking for an extra boost to get on foil or to ride smaller boards and foils. The Assist Slim is not suitable for prolongated periods of motor assisted riding, it simply provides the boost to get up on foil and ride more. Advanced Surf and Downwind riders will love the low profile and weight but will need to be very disciplined on the throttle usage. Wing foilers simple do not need the run time usually and will also appreciate the low profile and weight. 

NB: Boards with Carbon Tracks may experience connectivity issues. See our External Antenna

title: Foil Drive Assist Slim x Unifoil Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist Slim with UniFoil Integrated Mast 

This collaboration is for the UniFoil rider who wants to embrace their Foil Drive, while preserving the streamline, highly responsive design of the UniFoil masts. Designed for the entire foil line, the UniFoil masts are stiff, strong, and ready for any use and conditions.

While motor positions are fixed and cannot be changed once installed, the UniFoil x Foil Drive Mast Integration is perfect for riders who know exactly where they want their motor, and never want to move it.

NOTE: UniFoil Integrated Masts DO NOT come with the Adaptor, this is an additional add on if you need one.

NOT compatible with V2 Motors OR High Power Motors
variants_title: Slim Performance Battery X 2 / Motor Mounted at 15cm / AU

title: Foil Drive Assist Slim x Unifoil Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist Slim with UniFoil Integrated Mast 

This collaboration is for the UniFoil rider who wants to embrace their Foil Drive, while preserving the streamline, highly responsive design of the UniFoil masts. Designed for the entire foil line, the UniFoil masts are stiff, strong, and ready for any use and conditions.

While motor positions are fixed and cannot be changed once installed, the UniFoil x Foil Drive Mast Integration is perfect for riders who know exactly where they want their motor, and never want to move it.

NOTE: UniFoil Integrated Masts DO NOT come with the Adaptor, this is an additional add on if you need one.

title: Foil Drive Assist Slim x Unifoil Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist Slim with UniFoil Integrated Mast 

This collaboration is for the UniFoil rider who wants to embrace their Foil Drive, while preserving the streamline, highly responsive design of the UniFoil masts. Designed for the entire foil line, the UniFoil masts are stiff, strong, and ready for any use and conditions.

While motor positions are fixed and cannot be changed once installed, the UniFoil x Foil Drive Mast Integration is perfect for riders who know exactly where they want their motor, and never want to move it.

NOTE: UniFoil Integrated Masts DO NOT come with the Adaptor, this is an additional add on if you need one.

NOT compatible with V2 Motors OR High Power Motors

While motor positions are fixed and cannot be changed once installed, the Axis x Foil Drive Mast Integration is perfect for riders who know exactly where they want their motor, and never want to move it.

Mast does not include doodad/fuselage adaptor - click here to add

NOT compatible with V2 Motors OR High Power Motors

title: Foil Drive x Project Cedrus Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive x Project Cedrus Integrated Mast collaboration allows riders to continue enjoying full flexibility of foil choose while having the clean, sleek and efficient install of their Foil Drive motor and cable inside the mast.

With a Project Cedrus Mast you can simply bolt on the required Cedrus Foil Adaptor to suit the foils you want to ride. With new Gen2 compatible custom mast top mates, you can now bolt your Project Cedrus Mast to your Assist Slim or Assist MAX for the ultimate one piece electric assist, multi-brand foil mast!

Simply select the motor height you wish to have your motor installed at.

DOES NOT INCLUDE a Project Cedrus Foil Adaptor

title: Foil Drive Assist Slim x AXIS Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist Slim x AXIS Integrated Mast is the perfect blend of an AXIS foils renowned 19mm Aluminium mast with a Foil Drive Motor and cable built in from factory - 82cm Mast.

If you love your AXIS gear and never ride without your Foil Drive, this is the ultimate performance upgrade with less drag, less hassle and a super sleek looking setup. With two M8 mounting bolts, you can even secure your AXIS integrated mast straight to your Assist Slim or Assist MAX unit making setup at the beach faster than ever.

Mast does not include doodad/fuselage adaptor - click here

NOT compatible with V2 Motors OR High Power Motors
variants_title: Slim Performance Battery X 2 / Motor mounted at 15cm / AU

The Foil Drive Assist Slim x AXIS Integrated Mast is the perfect blend of an AXIS foils renowned 19mm Aluminium mast with a Foil Drive Motor and cable built in from factory - 82cm Mast.

If you love your AXIS gear and never ride without your Foil Drive, this is the ultimate performance upgrade with less drag, less hassle and a super sleek looking setup. With two M8 mounting bolts, you can even secure your AXIS integrated mast straight to your Assist Slim or Assist MAX unit making setup at the beach faster than ever.

Mast does not include doodad/fuselage adaptor - click here

NOT compatible with V2 Motors OR High Power Motors
variants_title: Slim Performance Battery X 2 / Motor Mounted at 20cm / USA

title: Foil Drive Assist Slim x AXIS Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist Slim x AXIS Integrated Mast is the perfect blend of an AXIS foils renowned 19mm Aluminium mast with a Foil Drive Motor and cable built in from factory - 82cm Mast.

If you love your AXIS gear and never ride without your Foil Drive, this is the ultimate performance upgrade with less drag, less hassle and a super sleek looking setup. With two M8 mounting bolts, you can even secure your AXIS integrated mast straight to your Assist Slim or Assist MAX unit making setup at the beach faster than ever.

Mast does not include doodad/fuselage adaptor - click here

title: Foil Drive x Unifoil Integrated Aluminium Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive x UniFoil integration came from the likes of Team Riders Erik Antonson and Paul Cooper. After getting hooked on Foil Drive, they both sought out to refine their ride, testing gear in different conditions and pushing limits. Paul Cooper taking the aerospace background of the company serious with his technical airs, sending it to the moon!

Unifoil's new aluminium mast provides riders a super stiff & high performance mast at a competitive price point. The result of many years of testing, they have created a more affordable mast that still unlocks the high performance of their wings. It’s a hydrodynamically efficient mast that is lightweight and stiff with minimal drag. 

Features:

  • Extruded with precision
  • Stainless steel inserts for added strength
  • Profile refined: maximum thickness moved backwards for speed


NOTE: UniFoil Integrated Masts DO NOT come with the Adaptor, this is an additional add on if you need one. Buy Unifoil Foil Adaptor

NOT compatible with V2 Motors OR High Power Motors

title: Airline Travel Battery Bundle - Assist PLUS
body_html:
Want to take your Foil Drive Assist PLUS on holidays with you? With the Small 4.2ah batteries you can! The Small Battery (120.9wh) is under the 160wh energy limit for airline travel.

Lithium-Ion battery for the Foil Drive Assist PLUS system only. Not compatible with Assist.

The Small 4.2ah Battery alone is perfect for Winging or competent Down Wind Foilers looking to reduce the weight. Due to it's size, this battery can only be used use full power for very short periods to get up on foil, it cannot be used for efoiling. Small Batteries can be purchased individually.

The included Parallel Y Lead connects 2x Small 4.2ah Batteries together, creating the capacity of an 8.4ah battery (2/3's a Standard Battery). Two batteries have been designed to fit together inside the electronics Box, you must follow the placement and orientation directions in the images above.

___

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

When flying on your chosen airline, you must contact them well before you fly as you will need prior approval for these batteries. Most airlines will allow a maximum of 3x spare batteries and generally must be in carry-on luggage. However please confirm with your airline first! Batteries will need to be below 30% State of Charge (SOC) and have both charge and discharge plugs protected with electrical tape with each battery in its Lipo bag for protection. (This advice is generic and must be confirmed with your airline. DG rules are taken extremely seriously and must not be broken.)

Read more about travelling with your Small 4.2ah Batteries here! 

If you are purchasing a new battery and have an existing charger, you may require a V2 Battery Adaptor Lead. We have changed the plugs on the V2 batteries so original V1 Charger require this adaptor lead, you can learn more and purchase one HERE

title: Battery Discharger Device - Gen1
body_html:
This smart device automatically discharges your Foil Drive battery down to the optimal storage voltage for safe and ideal storage conditions.

See it in action and how simple it is to use HERE!

This device is for Gen1 units only.

All lithium batteries do not like to be left fully charged for prolonged periods, or completely flat (week or longer). A great analogy being that you would try to put kids to bed full of sugar, and you'll also have a hard time getting them to sleep when they're over tired.

If you charge your battery up ready for a session that never eventuates, you can now quickly, safely and automatically discharge your battery back down to storage level.

The device has a smart phone app for monitoring the process and changing settings to speed up the process, lower or raise the cut off voltage etc.

 The perfect solution to look after your Foil Drive battery while not using it!

title: Low Profile Anchor Points
body_html:
Low Profile Anchor Points are the perfect addition to your kit to ensure it remains in place! Stick these directly to your board and use the provided strap to secure your kit.

Please keep in mind these anchor points must be used with 3M Dual Lock, and the strap should never be pulled super tight. If this strap is pulled too tight, you risk depressing the foam seal on the lid. Pull it to where you can not quite get a finger between the lid and the strap, and you're good to go!

title: Mounting Base Plate
body_html:
Perfect for those boards that have the deck pad go all the way to the rear of the board.

Use two foot strap screws to secure the plate to your board and then attached your box to the plate using the 3M Dual Lock strips like normal. We also have a front and rear slot in the plate if you want to use an additional retention strap.

Note: Foot strap screws are not included as the depth varies from board to board

title: Foil Drive Assist MAX x Unifoil Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist MAX with UniFoil Integrated Mast 

This collaboration is for the UniFoil rider who wants to embrace their Foil Drive, while preserving the streamline, highly responsive design of the UniFoil masts. Designed for the entire foil line, the UniFoil masts are stiff, strong, and ready for any use and conditions.

While motor positions are fixed and cannot be changed once installed, the UniFoil x Foil Drive Mast Integration is perfect for riders who know exactly where they want their motor, and never want to move it.

NOTE: UniFoil Integrated Masts DO NOT come with the Adaptor, this is an additional add on if you need one.
variants_title: MAX Power Battery / Motor Mounted at 15cm / AU

body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist MAX with UniFoil Integrated Mast 

This collaboration is for the UniFoil rider who wants to embrace their Foil Drive, while preserving the streamline, highly responsive design of the UniFoil masts. Designed for the entire foil line, the UniFoil masts are stiff, strong, and ready for any use and conditions.

While motor positions are fixed and cannot be changed once installed, the UniFoil x Foil Drive Mast Integration is perfect for riders who know exactly where they want their motor, and never want to move it.

NOTE: UniFoil Integrated Masts DO NOT come with the Adaptor, this is an additional add on if you need one.
variants_title: MAX Sport Battery / Motor Mounted at 20cm / EU

NOTE: UniFoil Integrated Masts DO NOT come with the Adaptor, this is an additional add on if you need one.
variants_title: MAX High Power Battery / Motor Mounted at 70cm - Efoil / EU

title: Unifoil Foil Adaptor
Foil Drive Mast Plate Bolts - Slim
body_html:
Securely attach your Foil Drive Slim to your mast with these Mast Plate Bolts. Reliable and easy to install, these bolts lock your system into place. 

We provide M6 , M7 and M8 options.

We supply 3 different length bolts 55, 60, 65mm to suit different depth foil tracks in boards and different thickness baseplates of masts. Please measure your required length to ensure you are using the correct bolts that engage with the t-nuts securely to avoid damage to your board, Foil Drive or foil mast. See the How-To video here.

Locking T Nuts in different sizes are sold separately. See listing here

title: Motor Plug Protector - Cable
body_html:
Our Motor Plug Protector is designed to safeguard the cable end of your v1 Motor, Integrated Mast, or v2 Removable Motor Cable.

The Plug is important in protecting your electronics from sand, debris, and salt spray, ensuring long-lasting performance

title: Titanium Integrated Mast Bolts
body_html:
Elevate your foiling experience with our Titanium Bolt Upgrade Set, featuring four precision-engineered titanium T-nuts and Torx head screws with countersunk heads.

At Foil Drive, we prioritise design and performance. That is why we use premium titanium for our hardware. This ensures ultimate strength and resistance to corrosion, guaranteeing a reliable mast-to-board connection for all your foiling adventures.

These shorter length bolts are specifically available for Integrated Masts where the Mast can be bolt to the Electronics Box. This makes installation and transportation a breeze as two pieces become one!

title: Titanium M8 Assist Slim Mast Plate Bolts 60mm
body_html:
Elevate your foiling experience with our Titanium Alloy Bolt Upgrade Set, featuring four precision-engineered Titanium T-nuts and Torx head screws with countersunk heads.

At Foil Drive, we prioritise design and performance. That is why we use premium titanium for our hardware. This ensures ultimate strength and resistance to corrosion, guaranteeing a reliable mast-to-board connection for all your foiling adventures.

These bolts also feature a section with no thread, reducing the rest of scratches to your mast or system, resulting in higher corrosion resistance!

title: Titanium M8 Assist MAX Mast Plate Bolts 80mm
body_html:
Elevate your foiling experience with our Titanium Alloy Bolt Upgrade Set, featuring four precision-engineered Titanium T-nuts and Torx head screws with countersunk heads.

At Foil Drive, we prioritise design and performance. That is why we use premium titanium for our hardware. This ensures ultimate strength and resistance to corrosion, guaranteeing a reliable mast-to-board connection for all your foiling adventures.

title: v2 Motor Cable O-Ring
body_html: The v2 Motor Cable O-Ring is ONLY compatible with v2 Motors for Gen2 Assist MAX and Assist Slim systems. This pack comes with 2x spare O-Rings.

title: Foil Drive v2 Stator Only
body_html:
Our newly redesigned V2 Stator is 10mm longer, enabling the integration of a removable Motor Plug.

This is a replacement or spare V2 Stator ONLY.

The V2 Stator is just one component of the Gen2 Motor, you will need to use your existing V2 Puck, V2 Motor Cable, V2 Motor, and Props.

This Stator is compatible with the Foil Drive Assist MAX and Assist Slim.

Not Included: This listing does not include a v2 Puck, v2 Motor Cable, Motor or Props.

title: Foil Drive v2 Motor
body_html:
The redesigned v2 Motor features a sleeker, more hydrodynamic design. With a 10mm extension to the Motor, it now accommodates a motor plug and offers added versatility with Removable v2 Motor Cables to easily change cable length. 

The Foil Drive v2 Motor is a key element of any Foil Drive setup. This motor is compatible with both the Foil Drive Assist MAX and Assist Slim. 

When used in conjunction with the Foil Drive Universal Motor Pods and Mast Adaptors, this motor is compatible with almost any foil mast on the market!

The v2 Motor Plug allows modularity with a quick and simple connection between your Foil Drive unit and your v2 Motors enabling the ultimate flexibility.

This includes a full v2 Motor (no cable), or you can opt to purchase just a v2 Stator Only if you're looking to reuse your Propellers, Hub, and Rotor.

Click here to learn about choosing the correct motor length or Click here to learn more about the V2 Motor system

title: Foil Drive v2 Motor Puck
body_html:
The Foil Drive v2 Motor Puck features a re-designed shape specific for use with the v2 Motors and their Removable V2 Motor Cable. When installing the puck, the cable must first be plugged into the Motor, then the Puck is installed over the top of the cable with the cut-out slot aligning with that on the motor cable. 

Provided hardware (4x M4 16mm Bolts) then lock the system in place. 

Note: The v2 Motor Puck is ONLY compatible with v2 motors for Gen2 systems. The v2 Puck utilises slightly shorter installation hardware than the original v1 Pucks. 

Please follow the instructional video to correctly replace the puck.

title: Foil Drive Removable v2 Motor Cable
body_html:
The Foil Drive Removable v2 Motor Cable allows for you to easily change the cable length and therefore position of the motor mounting on you mast. This allows you to customise your ride based on foiling discipline, skill level, rider preference and conditions.

Click here to learn how to choose the correct motor length.

The Removable v2 Motor Cable is compatible with the v2 Motor and is available in various cable lengths for adjusting motor placement on the mast. Each cable also comes with a v2 Motor Cable O-Ring.

Optional lengths:

12cm / 4.7"
15cm / 6"
20cm / 8"
25cm / 10"
60cm / 23.5"
70cm / 27.5"

This bundle is fully compatible with the Assist PLUS, Assist MAX, and Assist Slim units, with both the original v1 as well as the v2 Motor.

title: Foil Drive Large Stacked Logo Sticker
body_html:
High tack gloss vinyl sticker to represent Foil Drive on your board, car, laptop, cat* or anywhere that stickers normally go. These are clear background

 

Dimensions: 33cm x 25cm
*Although these stickers will stick to your cat very well, we do not recommend it at all...

title: Three Blade Propeller Bolts
body_html:
Custom Stainless Steel Bolts for Foil Drive Three Blade Propellers.

These bolts feature a custom-designed shoulder at the head of the bolt to nest into the hub, as well as pre-applied Loctite on the threaded section of the bolt to ensure secure fitment of your propellers.

These M3x30mm bolts have been individually CNC machined out of high-grade 316 Stainless Steel, specifically for Foil Drive Three Blade Propeller systems.

Click here to learn more about the bolts as well as other tips on how to mitigate breakages.

title: Foil Drive Slim Travel Battery
body_html:
Can Travel batteries be used e-foiling/constant power? No. These batteries are designed to be used in Assist mode only.
The Foil Drive Slim Travel Battery allows you to travel with your gear to your favourite riding destination and take a battery with you!

The Slim Travel Battery breaks down into 2 smaller sections for approved airline travel with 2 parts being 81wh and one part at 97.2wh. With just a few simple screws, the battery reassembles quickly and easily and can stay complete for storage, usage and charging.

Charge with 40V Foil Drive Chargers. Slim Travel Batteries cannot be charged with the 40V Fast Charger.

The complete battery when joined together is rated at 4.5ah capacity or 178wh meaning it is slightly larger capacity or run time than the Slim Performance battery. Due to the extra length added by the extra connector parts, the Travel Battery uses the longer "D" Nose Cone for your Assist Slim.

Most airlines around the world will allow a person to carry 20x batteries under 100wh, some do require pre-approval first though.

As with all Gen2 Foil Drive batteries, the Slim Travel Battery is certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. 

The single main power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust caps provides extra protection during storage & transport.

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist Slim. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive battery. Click here to learn about lithium battery use, care and storage.

NOTE - TRAVEL BATTERY UPDATE - Orders Placed on or after December 1st May Not Ship Out Til 6th of January 2025 Due to The Christmas Break .

title: Foil Drive MAX Travel Battery
body_html:
The Foil Drive MAX Travel Battery allows you to travel with your gear to your favourite riding destination and take a battery with you!

The MAX Travel Battery breaks down into three smaller sections for approved airline travel with 2 parts being 129.6wh and one part at 97.2wh. With just a few simple screws, the battery reassembles quickly and easily and can stay complete for storage, usage and charging.

The complete battery when joined together is rated at 9ah capacity or 350wh meaning it is slightly larger capacity or run time than the MAX Sport battery. Due to the extra length added by the extra connector parts, the Travel Battery uses the longer "A" Nose Cone for your Assist MAX.

Most airlines around the world will allow a person to carry 2x 100-160wh batteries, some do require pre-approval first though.

Can Travel batteries be used e-foiling/constant power? No. These batteries are designed to be used in Assist mode only.

As with all Gen2 Foil Drive batteries, the MAX Travel Battery is certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. 

The single main power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust caps provides extra protection during storage & transport.

Maximum boost: 20%
Max boost time: 15 seconds

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist MAX. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive battery. Click here to learn about lithium battery use, care and storage.

NOTE - TRAVEL BATTERY UPDATE - Orders Placed on or after December 1st May Not Ship Out Til 6th of January 2025 Due to The Christmas Break .

title: Motor Servicing Kit
body_html:
Keep your motor running smoothly with our comprehensive Motor Servicing Kit!

This kit is designed for easy maintenance and includes everything you need to ensure peak performance and longevity.

Includes:

2x Ceramic Bearings
1x Stainless Bearing
1x Bearing Pusher
1x Motor Separation Jig
2x Motor Protection Stickers
1x Motor Holder/Stand

title: Foil Drive Battery Grease 250g
body_html:
The Foil Drive Battery Grease is now BIGGER and better than ever! 

We’ve expanded the size to give you more of what you love. Our Battery Grease ensures you get the most out of our product with the same reliability you’ve come to trust. Elevate your experience with the larger tube of Battery Grease 250g, because more is always better!

Foil Drive Dielectric Battery Grease MUST be used on all connections (Battery and Motor Plug) before every use to ensure a reliable connection between the unit and motor cable, protecting against corrosion, heat, and oxidation.

Foil Drive Dielectric Grease has been specifically selected for the product and environmental use case. Only use Foil Drive Battery Grease as we cannot guarantee the reliability of third-party grease, this can void your warranty.

Read more about Battery Grease Here.

title: Foil Drive x Follow Bucket Hat
body_html: Follow x Foil Drive Bucket Hat - Tested to stay on in the water!

title: Foil Drive x Follow Sun Tee - Light Grey
body_html:
Foil Drive x Follow Sun Tee - Tested in Australia. Developed for the World.

At Follow Brand, the guys have been surfing in standard cotton tees as a form of protection from the sun. But cotton doesn't last or feel comfortable when wet. So we set about making a material sourced specifically to overcome these concerns. A lightweight material, dries fast, doesn't overly stretch when wet, and is ridiculously soft. While ensuring it maintains SPF30+ in-water shirt protection. We went through a lot of prototypes and testing until we nailed our brief. One touch and you'll see why we went to the effort.

title: Foil Drive x Follow Sun Tee - Light Grey
body_html:
Foil Drive x Follow Sun Tee - Tested in Australia. Developed for the World.

At Follow Brand, the guys have been surfing in standard cotton tees as a form of protection from the sun. But cotton doesn't last or feel comfortable when wet. So we set about making a material sourced specifically to overcome these concerns. A lightweight material, dries fast, doesn't overly stretch when wet, and is ridiculously soft. While ensuring it maintains SPF30+ in-water shirt protection. We went through a lot of prototypes and testing until we nailed our brief. One touch and you'll see why we went to the effort.

title: Foil Drive Propeller Guard
body_html:
This one has been tried and tested for some time now. Designed for those wanting to add some bump protection, the propeller guard is most definitely not for everyone but is available for those who want added peace of mind.

If you're considering a Propeller Guard, please head to our YouTube first and watch the full video where Ben talks you through the Pro's and Con's so you can make the best choice working out if a Prop Guard is for you or not!

Note: Existing Integrated Masts cannot utilise a Propeller Guard. Please contact us if you would like to order a Propeller Guard as part of a NEW Integrated Mast.

title: Controller Springs - Stiff
body_html:
Stiff Replacement Controller Springs are available as replacement parts.

Note: Long arm spring is for the smaller cruise controller trigger. Short arm spring is for the bigger throttle trigger.

 

If you need the triggers as well see this listing for Controller Triggers

 

For instructions on how to replace the controller trigger springs see the help centre article here.

title: Battery Plug Protector Caps
body_html: 2x Spare yellow protector cap for all Foil Drive Batteries

title: Spare Universal Adaptor Keys
body_html: Spare adjustable key set for the Universal Mast Adaptor

title: Stainless Steel Bearing
body_html: 1x High Quality Japanese Replacement Stainless Steel Motor Bearing

title: Deck Mount for External Antenna
body_html:
Additional Deck mount for your Foil Drive External Antenna. the Antenna does come with this mount however it may be required for additional boards.

 

Does not include External Antenna

title: Inline Battery Checker
body_html:
The Inline Battery Checker can be plugged in between your charger and your battery allowing you to see an active read out of your batteries current state of charge.  

It should be noted that while a charge is in progress, the battery checker will display a slightly higher reading than the actual value of the battery due to the current flowing into the battery during charge. To see the true state of charge, simply unplug the charger from the checker and wait 30 seconds for the reading to stabilise.


In addition, these have been programmed to display voltages. Simply single press the power button once plugged in and it will toggle the display. This is useful for tech heads, and can be used if we need to troubleshoot with you.

title: Foil Drive Assist Slim x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
body_html:
The Foil Drive Assist Slim kit with an Integrated NoLimitz v2 Mast.

The lightest, most streamlined integrated Foil Drive mast on the market.

The best just got better. The Foil Drive NoLimitz V2 Integrated Mast combines the lightest stiff mast in the world with the lightest, most powerful electronic  

The result is a beautifully integrated product that results in a lighter, faster, and more efficient set up. As seen in the videos - the ride is silky smooth, responsive, and quick. Significantly, there can be a 15-20% increase in battery life due to the NoLimitz’s reduction in drag and ease in popping up out of the water.   

The NoLimitz fuselage connection is built to your specification with fuselage adapters available for all the major brands.

This product is designed to maximize your fun from your foiling experience, whether you’re SUP down winding, prone foiling, winging, or simply pumping around your local lake.

Simply choose:

  • 78 or 85cm Mast Length
  • A Fixed Motor Mounting Position - We recommend 15cm/6", 20cm/8", 25cm/10", 70cm/27.5"
  • A Fixed, non-removable Mast Adaptor to suit the brand of foil you ride

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 4-6 week lead time as they are custom made to order.

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

title: Foil Drive External Antenna
body_html:
The Foil Drive External Antenna allows you to place a secondary antenna on the top surface of your board for increased signal strength and connection with Gen2 Assist MAX and Assist Slim systems. 

Note: All Antennas are supplied with Foam to increase your Nose Cone height by 2mm

The Patent Pending signal attenuation technology has been developed alongside a highly specialist team of international engineers that create wireless communications systems for nuclear power plant operations! This is not just a piece of wire and a standard patch antenna off the shelf!

Who is it for?

This accessory is primarily designed for use with boards that feature full carbon foil tracks laminated into a full carbon board. The standard built-in antenna within the Foil Drive Gen2 is perfect for most applications, however carbon tracks and some carbon layups do increase the difficulty of the signal transmitting through the board reliably.

Please watch the How To Improve Controller Signal Connectivity Masterclass video on our YouTube first before deciding if you need a External Antenna for your setup!

How does it work

The External Antenna is a thin 2mm plate installed between the electronics box and the board with a thin cable. The cable is available in either 130cm or 180cm and runs along the bottom of the board to a small antenna pad mounted on the top of the board. The antenna is totally passive and does not require power or link to the Foil Drive electronics box.

Watch the full video here!

The External Antenna can be installed on you board and left there regardless if you are using the Foil Drive or not.

The External Antenna is not compatible with the Foil Drive Gen1 Assist or Assist PLUS

Some boards with standard or deep tracks that use the 2mm thick External Antenna, may need to use Longer Mast Plate Bolts 85mm bolts for the Assist MAX or the 65mm Assist Slim.

Please measure your required length to ensure you are using the correct bolts that engage with the t-nuts securely to avoid damage to your board, Foil Drive or foil mast. See the How-To video here.

title: Foil Drive x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
body_html:
NoLimitz Masts are built custom to your order

The lightest, most streamlined integrated Foil Drive mast on the market.

The best just got better. The Foil Drive NoLimitz V2 Integrated Mast combines the lightest stiff mast in the world with the lightest, most powerful electronic  

The result is a beautifully integrated product that results in a lighter, faster, and more efficient set up. As seen in the videos - the ride is silky smooth, responsive, and quick. Significantly, there can be a 15-20% increase in battery life due to the NoLimitz’s reduction in drag and ease in popping up out of the water.   

The NoLimitz fuselage connection is built to your specification with fuselage adapters available for all the major brands.

This product is designed to maximize your fun from your foiling experience, whether you’re SUP down winding, prone foiling, winging, or simply pumping around your local lake.

Simply choose:

  • 78 or 85cm Mast Length
  • A Fixed Motor Mounting Position - We recommend 15cm/6", 20cm/8", 25cm/10", 70cm/27.5"
  • A Fixed, non-removable Mast Adaptor to suit the brand of foil you ride

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 8 week lead time.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 8 week lead time.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

title: Foil Drive x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
body_html:
NoLimitz Masts are built custom to your order

The lightest, most streamlined integrated Foil Drive mast on the market.

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

title: Foil Drive x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
body_html:
NoLimitz Masts are built custom to your order

The lightest, most streamlined integrated Foil Drive mast on the market.

The best just got better. The Foil Drive NoLimitz V2 Integrated Mast combines the lightest stiff mast in the world with the lightest, most powerful electronic  

The result is a beautifully integrated product that results in a lighter, faster, and more efficient set up. As seen in the videos - the ride is silky smooth, responsive, and quick. Significantly, there can be a 15-20% increase in battery life due to the NoLimitz’s reduction in drag and ease in popping up out of the water.   

The NoLimitz fuselage connection is built to your specification with fuselage adapters available for all the major brands.

This product is designed to maximize your fun from your foiling experience, whether you’re SUP down winding, prone foiling, winging, or simply pumping around your local lake.

Simply choose:

  • 78 or 85cm Mast Length
  • A Fixed Motor Mounting Position - We recommend 15cm/6", 20cm/8", 25cm/10", 70cm/27.5"
  • A Fixed, non-removable Mast Adaptor to suit the brand of foil you ride

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 8 week lead time.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

title: Foil Drive x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
body_html:
NoLimitz Masts are built custom to your order

The lightest, most streamlined integrated Foil Drive mast on the market.

The best just got better. The Foil Drive NoLimitz V2 Integrated Mast combines the lightest stiff mast in the world with the lightest, most powerful electronic  

The result is a beautifully integrated product that results in a lighter, faster, and more efficient set up. As seen in the videos - the ride is silky smooth, responsive, and quick. Significantly, there can be a 15-20% increase in battery life due to the NoLimitz’s reduction in drag and ease in popping up out of the water.   

The NoLimitz fuselage connection is built to your specification with fuselage adapters available for all the major brands.

This product is designed to maximize your fun from your foiling experience, whether you’re SUP down winding, prone foiling, winging, or simply pumping around your local lake.

Simply choose:

  • 78 or 85cm Mast Length
  • A Fixed Motor Mounting Position - We recommend 15cm/6", 20cm/8", 25cm/10", 70cm/27.5"
  • A Fixed, non-removable Mast Adaptor to suit the brand of foil you ride

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 8 week lead time.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

This product is designed to maximize your fun from your foiling experience, whether you’re SUP down winding, prone foiling, winging, or simply pumping around your local lake.

Simply choose:

  • 78 or 85cm Mast Length
  • A Fixed Motor Mounting Position - We recommend 15cm/6", 20cm/8", 25cm/10", 70cm/27.5"
  • A Fixed, non-removable Mast Adaptor to suit the brand of foil you ride

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 8 week lead time.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

title: Foil Drive x NoLimitz v2 Integrated Mast
body_html:
NoLimitz Masts are built custom to your order

The lightest, most streamlined integrated Foil Drive mast on the market.

The best just got better. The Foil Drive NoLimitz V2 Integrated Mast combines the lightest stiff mast in the world with the lightest, most powerful electronic  

The result is a beautifully integrated product that results in a lighter, faster, and more efficient set up. As seen in the videos - the ride is silky smooth, responsive, and quick. Significantly, there can be a 15-20% increase in battery life due to the NoLimitz’s reduction in drag and ease in popping up out of the water.   

The NoLimitz fuselage connection is built to your specification with fuselage adapters available for all the major brands.

This product is designed to maximize your fun from your foiling experience, whether you’re SUP down winding, prone foiling, winging, or simply pumping around your local lake.

Simply choose:

  • 78 or 85cm Mast Length
  • A Fixed Motor Mounting Position - We recommend 15cm/6", 20cm/8", 25cm/10", 70cm/27.5"
  • A Fixed, non-removable Mast Adaptor to suit the brand of foil you ride

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 8 week lead time.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

The best just got better. The Foil Drive NoLimitz V2 Integrated Mast combines the lightest stiff mast in the world with the lightest, most powerful electronic  

The result is a beautifully integrated product that results in a lighter, faster, and more efficient set up. As seen in the videos - the ride is silky smooth, responsive, and quick. Significantly, there can be a 15-20% increase in battery life due to the NoLimitz’s reduction in drag and ease in popping up out of the water.   

The NoLimitz fuselage connection is built to your specification with fuselage adapters available for all the major brands.

This product is designed to maximize your fun from your foiling experience, whether you’re SUP down winding, prone foiling, winging, or simply pumping around your local lake.

Simply choose:

  • 78 or 85cm Mast Length
  • A Fixed Motor Mounting Position - We recommend 15cm/6", 20cm/8", 25cm/10", 70cm/27.5"
  • A Fixed, non-removable Mast Adaptor to suit the brand of foil you ride

Note: Once ordered, you cannot change the specifications of your mast as they are custom made.

This Mast currently has a 8 week lead time.

NoLimitz does not offer a universal fuselage adaptor, they offer brand specific adaptors that are permanently attached to the mast. However, Jim Stringfellow makes a wide variety of adapters that go onto our Takuma 3 bolt adapter, which makes that mast compatible with a variety of additional foil brands. Foil Drive WILL NOT be supplying or selling Jim Stringfellow adaptors at this time. Contact him directly to enquire.

For the complete details on the V2 compatibility, click here: https://www.nolimitz.com/v2compatibility

As of Jan 2025, NoLimitz has adjusted their warranty and introduced a wingspan limit to the mast.

The V2 foil mast is incompatible with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. If a mast failure occurs as a result of the use of a front wing greater in span than 100cm or 39in, we will not be able to warranty the mast.

Please do not use your mast with front wings greater in span than 100cm or 39in. The V2 was not designed for the bending moments that result from the use of front wings with spans greater than 100cm / 39in. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

title: Foil Drive Universal Mast Adaptor
body_html:
The NEW Universal Mast Adaptor is made of a soft, flexible material that can de-form around your mast to create a solid and secure connection for your motor.

Universal Motor Pod Not Included, this is the Adaptor ONLY. If you need the External Universal Motor Pod as well, click here. Note: If you have a Universal Motor Pod from and existing Custom Mast Adaptor, it is compatible with the Universal Mast Adaptor!

The unique design features  six sized "keys"  that are to be installed into the front of the adaptor to allow for fitment of all different sizes and shapes of mast between 90mm and 150mm.

The user will need to fit and test the different keys to find the correct one for their mast and the taper of the position you would like to mount your motor.

It is important the key you select is the correct size, to still allow a clamping force of the two halves. We highly recommend watching the installation video.


Note: A very small number of masts exceed the 150mm limitation and require a custom mast adaptor. Known masts include:

- Neil Pryde Glide Wind

title: Hydrofoil Wingscrew Bolts Assist Slim Wingnut Set M7
body_html:
The Hydrofoil Wingscrews from www.customwingscrews.com allows for easier install of your mast and Gen2 system to your board.

For use with Foil Drive Gen 2 Slim (not for use with MAX). Will work on boards with either Futures style tracks or deep tracks. Designed to be used with the Armstrong Performance mast as well as masts that use M8 hardware. May not work with Cabrinha carbon masts or others will deeply recessed screw holes.

78mm bolt length. Also available in 90mm for MAX.

title: Hydrofoil Wingscrew Bolts Assist MAX Wingnut Set M7
body_html:
The Hydrofoil Wingscrews from www.customwingscrews.com allows for easier install of your mast and Gen2 system to your board.

For use with Foil Drive Gen 2 MAX (not for use with SLIM). Will work on boards with either Futures style tracks or deep tracks. Designed to be used with the Armstrong Performance mast as well as masts that use M8 hardware. May not work with Cabrinha Carbon Masts or others will deeply recessed screw holes.

90mm bolt length. Also available in 78mm for Slim.

title: M6 Locking T Nuts
body_html: Foil Drive Locking T Nuts are made from 316 Stainless Steel and are available in M6 and M8. Included with all Gen2 Systems, these T Nuts slide into your mast tracks and are able to lock in place once you know exactly where you ned them. This makes installation 10x faster and ensures your gear stays excatly where you want it, every time.

title: Foil Drive Medium Logo Sticker 4 Pack
body_html:
High tack gloss vinyl sticker to represent Foil Drive on your board, car, laptop, cat* or anywhere that stickers normally go. These are clear background

 

Dimensions: 33cm x 5cm
*Although these stickers will stick to your cat very well, we do not recommend it at all...

title: M8 Locking T Nuts
body_html: Foil Drive Locking T Nuts are made from 316 Stainless Steel and are available in M6 and M8. Included with all Gen2 Systems, these T Nuts slide into your mast tracks and are able to lock in place once you know exactly where you ned them. This makes installation 10x faster and ensures your gear stays excatly where you want it, every time.

title: Foil Drive Mast Soft Cover
body_html:
Foil Drive Mast Bags are a staple for protecting your gear, and representing your favourite brand! These bags have been custom designed to alloy you to leave the motor attached to the mast. Simply remove your Rotor (Motor Can) and slide the stubby cooler over the Stator fore complete protection.

Note: All Integrated Mast purchases come supplied with a Mast Bag

title: Project Cedrus Foil Adapters
body_html:
The Project Cedrus Foil Adaptors are designed to adapt a range of different foil brands fuselages to the Foil Drive x Project Cedrus Integrated Mast.

Additional adaptors can be purchased direct from Project Cedrus.

Project Cedrus Says:

"Project Cedrus is the only fully universal hydrofoil mast thanks to the use of precision machined adapters which have been refined since the original introduction in 2019. Machined in the USA from 6061-T6 aluminum alloy, and anodized for corrosion protection, these adapters can offer a stronger connection to the fuselage than OEM masts thanks to additional material around the threaded holes, tighter manufacturing tolerances, and better material traceability"

title: Three Blade Propeller Hub and Rotor Bundle
body_html:
Looking for just a little more torque to get out of the water easier?

Designed to increase low end thrust, the Three Blade Propeller Hub is an optional upgrade for Foil Drive Assist PLUS units, a game changer for riders pushing the limits of rider weight, board size and foil size.

Why purchase the bundle? Having two rotors and propeller set ups means you can quickly interchange your set up from two to three propellers, ideal if you have multiple riders, or use cases!


When compared to the standard Two Blade Propeller system, the NEW Three Blade Propeller system improves performance by:

  • Increased low end thrust. The extra blade helps push more water
  • More torque at lower RPM, avoiding propeller cavitation under high load
  • More effective surface driving when the props breach the surface
  • A smoother, quieter ride due to lower RPM

It is specifically designed for riders who require more low-end torque, whether this is due to using a low volume board, a smaller or higher aspect foil than normal, or being a heavier rider. 

We do not recommend using the Three Blade Propeller Hub for prolonged e-foiling at full throttle as this will drain your battery much quicker and could cause the electronics to go into thermal overload protection. The three blade propellers will draw more watts / power than the two blade prop that can " unload " at full throttle when on foil. Do NOT use three blade prop above 90% throttle continuously when efoiling. You must let the ESC in the box cool in the water from time to time.

Included with Three Blade Propeller Hubs is a range of hardware, with two options of bolts, Standard Propeller Bolts and new Button Top Bolts:

3x M3 30mm 2.5mm Standard Propeller Bolts can be used, these are the same as propeller bolts used on the 2 blade hub. Alternatively, 3x M3 30mm 2mm Button Top Propeller Bolts can be used to improve hydrodynamics, a secondary tool required. As they are not in the flow of water, they do not cause formation of small bubbles that then enter the prop.

The smaller Button Top Bolts require a 2mm Allen Key and cannot be used with your existing 2.5mm Driver that comes standard with all Foil Drive kits.

Note:

- Not compatible with Foil Drive Assist. While they do fit, these propellers require the higher RMP of the Assist PLUS in order to improve performance.

-Three Blade Propeller Hubs must be used with three propellers! 

- There are 3 options available for purchasing the Three Blade Propeller Hub. If you are wanting to upgrade your existing Two Blade Propeller Hub, you can purchase the hub with 1x propeller and use your existing props, OR, the full set with three propellers. You are viewing the full set with Rotor + Stubbie BUNDLE.

Check out our Tech Talk on the three-blade propeller!

title: Controller Wireless Charger Pad
body_html: Wireless Charging Pad and Cable for Foil Drive Controller.

title: Gen2 Board Protection Sticker
body_html:
Replacement sticker for the the base of Foil Drive Assist MAX and Assist Slim systems. This sticker is designed to protect your board from the metal casing of the system and may need to be replaced.

It is recommended to clean the surface with an Isopropyl Alcohol prior to application, then allow it to completely dry before applying the sticker. Try avoid unnecessary contact to the adhesive surface (fingers may create a greasy layer).

title: Stainless Steel Bolt Kit - Assist Plus
body_html: Stainless Steel 316 Bolts are available as spare or replacement parts for the assembly of the Foil Drive Assist and Assist PLUS System.

title: Pick Tool
T30 Torx Driver
body_html: T30 Torx Driver for Gen2 Foil Drive.

title: T40 Torx Driver
body_html: T40 Torx Driver for Gen2 Foil Drive.

title: Motor Plug Protector - Box
body_html: This is a replacement Motor Plug Protector with Keychain for both Assist MAX and Assist Slim. This plug is important in keeping your electronics free of sand, debris and salt spray.

title: Nose Cone Rocker Foam Pad
body_html: This is a replacement Nose Cone Rocker Foam Pad. It’s designed to provide cushioning between the Foil Drive Nose Cone and board where a gap may be present.

title: Mast Track Foam Inserts
body_html: Additional Mast Track Foam Inserts are available for Gen2 Systems. These are super important to improve connectivity between your controller and your kit, especially when using carbon boards. Additional pieces may be required to fill the entire length of the track.

title: Latch Assembly - Foil Drive Assist Slim
body_html: Replacement Latches Assembly for Assist Slim.

title: O-Ring Seals - Foil Drive Assist Slim
body_html: These are replacement O-Ring Seals for Assist Slim.

title: Foil Drive Slim Endurance Battery
body_html:
The Foil Drive Slim Endurance Battery is the larger SLIM battery with 241Wh capacity. The Endurance Battery is great for those who are wanting to lengthen their runtime with the Assist Slim, however, due to the lower voltage this battery does not provide the same level of thrust and overall ride experience as the Slim Performance Battery.

The Slim Endurance Battery is the only Gen2 battery that runs on a 28V system. This means you must use the 28V Standard Charger 4A with this battery. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CHARGE THIS BATTERY WITH A 40V Charger!

YOU MUST READ this Critical Battery Configuration information about the usage of the 28v Slim Endurance battery.

 

As with all Gen2 Foil Drive batteries, the Slim Endurance Battery is certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. 

The single power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust cap provides extra protection during storage & transport.

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist Slim. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive battery. Click here to learn more about lithium battery use, care and storage.

Click here to learn about the differences between our batteries for Gen1 and Gen2.

title: Foil Drive Slim Performance Battery
body_html:
The Foil Drive Slim Performance Battery is the smaller Slim battery with 166Wh capacity. The Performance Battery is great for those who are wanting a punchy, high performing, light-weight ride at the cost of runtime.

As with all Gen2 Foil Drive batteries, the Slim Endurance Battery is certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust.

The single power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust cap provides extra protection during storage & transport.

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist Slim. 

DO NOT use the 40v Fast Charger 8amp with the Slim Performance battery. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive battery. Click here to learn more about lithium battery use, care and storage.

Click here to learn about the difference between our Gen1 and Gen2 batteries.

title: Foil Drive MAX Sport Battery
body_html:
The Foil Drive MAX Sport Battery is the smaller, lighter MAX battery with 332Wh capacity. This offers Assist MAX users the ability to reduce the weight of their install for those riders looking for ultimate performance at the cost of reduced runtime. 

As with all Gen2 Foil Drive batteries, the MAX Sport Battery is certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. 

The single power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust cap provides extra protection during storage & transport.

Maximum boost: 20%
Max boost time:  15 seconds

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist MAX. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive batteries. Click here to learn more about lithium battery use, care and storage.

Click here to learn about the difference between our Gen1 and Gen2 batteries.

title: O-Ring Seals - Foil Drive Assist MAX
body_html: These are replacement O-Ring Seals for Assist MAX.

title: Foil Drive MAX Power Battery
body_html:
The Foil Drive MAX Power Battery is the largest battery with 498Wh capacity. This offers the longest run time for those looking for high power performance.

As with all Gen2 Foil Drive batteries, the MAX Power Battery is certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. 

The single power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust cap provides extra protection during storage & transport.


Maximum boost: 24%
Max boost time: 18 seconds

Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist MAX. 

It is important to properly care for your Foil Drive battery. Click here to learn about lithium battery use, care and storage.

Click here to learn about the differences between our Gen1 and Gen2 batteries.

title: Assist PLUS Batteries
body_html:
These are the 28v batteries compatible with the Foil Drive Assist PLUS.

The Foil Drive PLUS Standard Battery is the largest PLUS battery with 362 Wh capacity. This offers the longest run time with for those looking for high power performance.

The Foil Drive PLUS Small Battery is the smallest, lighter battery with 160 Wh capacity. This offers Assist PLUS users the ability to reduce the weight of their install for those riders looking for ultimate performance at the cost of reduced runtime. This Battery is Airline Travel approved for most airlines, see the article here for more info.

The Foil Drive PLUS Airline Travel Bundle is simply a bundle of 2x PLUS Small Batteries, Parallel "Y" Lead Joiner and a 28v Battery Checker. The PLUS Small Battery is Airline Travel approved for most airlines, see the article here for more info.

Batteries only compatible with the Foil Drive Assist PLUS

title: Foil Drive Slim Batteries
body_html:
These are the three batteries compatible with the Foil Drive Assist Slim system.

The Foil Drive Slim Endurance Battery is the larger battery with 241Wh capacity. This offers the longer endurance with the Assist Slim system at the cost of some top end thrust. This battery is the only Gen2 battery that operates on 28v and therefore requires a 28v charger DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CHARGE THE SLIM ENDURANCE BATTERY ON A 40V CHARGER. 

The Foil Drive Slim Performance Battery is the smaller, lighter Slim battery with 166 Wh capacity. This offers Assist Slim users the ability to reduce the weight of their install for those riders looking for ultimate performance at the cost of reduced runtime.

As with all Gen 2 Foil Drive batteries, they are certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. The single power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust cap provides extra protection during storage & transport. Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist Slim.

title: Foil Drive Slim Batteries
body_html:
These are the three batteries compatible with the Foil Drive Assist Slim system.

The Foil Drive Slim Endurance Battery is the larger battery with 241Wh capacity. This offers the longer endurance with the Assist Slim system at the cost of some top end thrust. This battery is the only Gen2 battery that operates on 28v and therefore requires a 28v charger DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CHARGE THE SLIM ENDURANCE BATTERY ON A 40V CHARGER. 

The Foil Drive Slim Performance Battery is the smaller, lighter Slim battery with 166 Wh capacity. This offers Assist Slim users the ability to reduce the weight of their install for those riders looking for ultimate performance at the cost of reduced runtime.

As with all Gen 2 Foil Drive batteries, they are certified IP68 rated for increased protection and peace of mind against water and dust. The single power plug contains larger connectors that provide power to the Foil Drive unit and smaller connectors for charging the battery. The included dust cap provides extra protection during storage & transport. Only compatible with Foil Drive Assist Slim.

title: Foil Drive Battery Grease 15g
body_html:
Foil Drive Dielectric Battery Grease MUST be used on all connections (Battery and Motor Plug) before every use to ensure a reliable connection between unit and motor cable, protecting against corrosion, heat, and oxidation.

Foil Drive Dielectric Grease has been specifically selected for the product and environmental use case. Only use Foil Drive Battery Grease as we cannot guarantee the reliability of third party grease, this can void your warranty.

Read more about Battery Grease Here.
