title: Foil Drive Universal Motor Pod
body_html:
The Universal Motor Pod is an important part of the Foil Drive setup and it must be used with Foil Drive Mast Adaptors.

These outer sleeves are universal and can easily adapt from mast to mast by simply interchanging the internal Mast Adaptor Keys.

The combination of the Universal Motor Pod and the Mast Adaptor is a v2 refinement of the original one piece motor pods that we started with. These outer sections are super strong injection moulded poly-carbonate fiberglass reinforced. 

Learn more about the v2 Universal Motor Pods here!

Every Universal Motor Pod comes with a common rear section that your motor mounts to via the Motor Puck and 2x Nose cones. There is one short nose and one long nose cone to accommodate all Mast Adaptors that are of varying lengths. You simply need to use the correct length nose cone for the Mast Adaptor Keys you use. These are very obviously different lengths, so its not too hard to get wrong!

While every kit comes with a set of Universal Motor Pod parts, you may be after a second set up, or replacements. Just don't forget to add another Internal Adaptor to your cart if you need:

Shop Universal Mast Adaptor
Shop Custom Mast Adaptor

This set does not come with a Mast Adaptor!

title: Three Blade Propeller Upgrade
body_html:
Looking for just a little more torque to get out of the water easier?

Designed to increase low end thrust, the Three Blade Propeller Hub is an optional upgrade for Foil Drive Assist PLUS units, a game changer for riders pushing the limits of rider weight, board size and foil size.


When compared to the standard Two Blade Propeller system, the NEW Three Blade Propeller system improves performance by:

  • Increased low end thrust
  • More torque at lower RPM, avoiding propeller cavitation under high load
  • More effective surface driving when the props breach the surface
  • A smoother, quieter ride

It is specifically designed for riders who require more low end torque, whether this is due to using a low volume board, a smaller or higher aspect foil than normal, or being a heavier rider. 

We do not recommend using the Three Blade Propeller Hub for prolonged efoiling at full throttle as this will drain your battery much quicker, and could cause the electronics to overheat and enter thermal protection mode.

Note:

- Not compatible with Foil Drive Assist. While they do fit, these propellers require the higher RMP of the Assist PLUS in order to improve performance.

-Three Blade Propeller Hubs must be used with three propellers! 

 

Note for Existing Propellers: If you have any damage to your propellers, we recommend you consider the full set with three fresh, balanced propellers. Unbalanced propellers may cause vibration and damage to your system.

 

Check out our Tech Talk on the three-blade propeller!

title: Three Blade Hub
body_html:
Replacement Three Blade Propeller Hub for Aluminium Propellers and Foil Drive Assist PLUS only!

Propellers not included.

title: Kāohi Leash x Foil Drive Wrist Leash for Throttle Controller
body_html:
Combine the best of both worlds with the "Kāohi Leash X Foil Drive" Wrist Leash, for your Throttle Controller.

Adjustable "Kāohi Leash X Foil Drive" Cuff secures your controller to your wrist.

Improves your hands-free experience, so you can fly with extra security.

Note: The Kāohi Leash was re-designed May 2024 with improvements to chord and the controller connection.

Kāohi Leash Cuff
- Tightens easily with one hand via a stainless slide
- Soft & comfortable neoprene paddling
- Adjustable, secure hook and loop

Foil Drive Leash Cord

- High-quality nylon lanyard designed to last
- Easily and securely connects your "Throttle Controller" to the adjustable Kāohi X Foil Drive leash Cuff 


Shop more from Kāohi Here

title: Motor Pod Blank
body_html:
With multiple requests in our Facebook Owners Group, these pod blanks have been specifically designed for those who remove their motor from time to time, but leave their pod attached, to head out foiling without the added power.

These blanks fill the void of the motor and create a more hydrodynamic shape than leaving the pod attached by itself.

title: Motor Separation Jig
body_html:
The perfect jig to remove the motor can from your motor without damaging the bearings. 

For more instruction read HERE.

Replacement bearings are also available if you do damage them.

title: Ceramic Bearing
body_html:
Replacement Ceramic Bearing for all Foil Drive motors. 

Contains 1x Ceramic Bearings and 1x Press tool

Each customer will receive a Bearing Press Tool for free, one tool per customer. 

Instructions and guidance for bearing replacement on the Help Centre HERE.

title: Foil Drive 22v Battery Charger
body_html:
110-240v Lithium Battery Charger for your Foil Drive Battery.

This Charger only comes in Australian/New Zealand Plus - Type I.

Assist Battery requires 22v charger - This charger is ONLY for the Assist Batteries

Do not use other chargers with your Foil Drive Batteries, do not modify the battery or charger in any way.

title: Foil Drive Custom Mast Adaptor
body_html:
The Custom Mast Adaptor is for those customers who's mast is not compatible with the Universal Mast Adaptor! Be sure to chat with Foil Drive or your local dealer before ordering the Custom Adaptor, as the Universal Adaptor may be a better solution!

___

Please check the table HERE before ordering to ensure you have the right adaptor for our mast.

Changed your foil mast setup or added to your collection? Simply pick up the correct Foil Drive Mast Adaptor to get setup on your new gear!

The best way to ensure you have the correct mast adaptor is to check the measurements against our table. If your mast is not listed, please contact us!

Note: Some adaptors on the list are temporarily available by custom order only as we work around a website limitation. Please email support@foildrive.com

This listing is for the Inner Mast Adaptor pieces that require the Outer Universal Motor Pod sections available here.

If you have the older style single piece Motor Pod, you will need to purchase the Universal Motor Pod parts also to upgrade to the new style Motor Pod. More information can be found here. 

The Foil Drive kits comes with 1 set of Mast Adaptor pieces, add this item to the cart if you want an additional or spare adaptor set.

Only available to existing Foil Drive customers. Not sold separately!

title: Foil Drive Custom Mast Adaptor
body_html:

The Custom Mast Adaptor is for those customers who's mast is not compatible with the Universal Mast Adaptor! Be sure to chat with Foil Drive or your local dealer before ordering the Custom Adaptor, as the Universal Adaptor may be a better solution!

___

Please check the table HERE before ordering to ensure you have the right adaptor for our mast.

Changed your foil mast setup or added to your collection? Simply pick up the correct Foil Drive Mast Adaptor to get setup on your new gear!

The best way to ensure you have the correct mast adaptor is to check the measurements against our table. If your mast is not listed, please contact us!

Note: Some adaptors on the list are temporarily available by custom order only as we work around a website limitation. Please email support@foildrive.com

This listing is for the Inner Mast Adaptor pieces that require the Outer Universal Motor Pod sections available here.

If you have the older style single piece Motor Pod, you will need to purchase the Universal Motor Pod parts also to upgrade to the new style Motor Pod. More information can be found here. 

The Foil Drive kits comes with 1 set of Mast Adaptor pieces, add this item to the cart if you want an additional or spare adaptor set.

Only available to existing Foil Drive customers. Not sold separately!

The Foil Drive kits comes with 1 set of Mast Adaptor pieces, add this item to the cart if you want an additional or spare adaptor set.

Only available to existing Foil Drive customers. Not sold separately!

title: Foil Drive Custom Mast Adaptor
body_html:
The Custom Mast Adaptor is for those customers who's mast is not compatible with the Universal Mast Adaptor! Be sure to chat with Foil Drive or your local dealer before ordering the Custom Adaptor, as the Universal Adaptor may be a better solution!

title: Rubber Strap and 3M Dual Lock
body_html: Rubber Strap and 3M Dual Lock for your Mounting Base Plate or Low Profile Anchor Points.

title: Electronics Box Connector Kit
body_html: Replacement electronics box plugs for the battery monitor and main power lead.

title: V2 Battery Connector Kit
V1 Battery Connector Kit
V1 Charger Connector Kit
V2 Battery Adaptor Lead
body_html: If you are ordering a new V2 battery and currently have V1 batteries, you will need to add a V2 adaptor lead to your cart. This lead allows you to use your V1 charger on V2 batteries.

title: Discharger Adaptor Lead - Gen1
body_html: An additional lead for your discharge device.

title: Foil Drive Rotor Only
body_html:
Replacement Motor Cans are available for all v1 and v2 motors.

 

This IS NOT compatible with the High Power Motor.

title: Controller Charge Cradle
body_html:
Designed to perfectly fit your Foil Drive Controller and Charge Pad, the Charge Cradle can be mounted to a bench or wall, particularly useful if charging in a van! 

Keep in mind, controllers should not be left on the charge pad. These induction charge and if left on charge once full will become unnecessarily hot.

title: Motor Holder/Stand
body_html:
Fit it to your workshop bench, or in your foiling van, to securely store your motor.
It's also super handy for servicing your motor or when changing over hubs and propellers.

title: Re-Usable Rubber Ties
body_html:
Whilst designed to tidy your cable, or secure your controller to your paddle, these little
re-usable ties are super handy! Every kit comes with a tie but we're sure you've got 1000 ideas on where else you can use them so grab yourself a two pack!

Colours may vary

title: Box Latches - Gen1
body_html:
Please contact Foil Drive prior to purchase in order to ensure these will be a correct solution for you. Replacement Lids are also available if required.

This item is specific to Gen1 Foil Drive Assist  and Assist PLUS.

title: Cable Repair/Extension Kit
body_html:
Kit to repair or extend your cable. Please email support@foildrive.com before purchasing this item to get special instructions.

There are very specific steps required to ensure your gear remains waterproof and durable.

This cable is also specific high strand count cable, please do not use any standard 3 core wire from a hardware store.

 Instructions: Watch the how to here

title: Aluminium Propellers
body_html:
Looking to reach maximum performance, durability and style? The Aluminium Propellers are the ultimate upgrade. These Anodised, 5 Axis CNC Machined blades increase the usability of your Foil Drive™ Assist PLUS thanks to their refined shape, thinner, stronger and sleeker design.


Ultimate durability comes from the stiffness, preventing flex when under load and providing an increase in thrust and torque throughout the power range. Durability being incredibly important when offshore, never to be left with a damaged prop due to debris.
For ultimate performance, these propellers must only be used with a Nylon Hub. These can be purchased separately or in the Aluminium Propellers and Nylon Hub Kit.

Note:
- Not compatible with Foil Drive Assist. While they do fit, these propellers require the higher RMP of the Assist PLUS in order to improve performance.
- Only available to Foil Drive Assist PLUS owners.

title: Foil Drive™ Hoodie
body_html:
Headed out in the cold, grab a Foil Drive Hoodie! With our Foil Drive Icon on the front, logo and slogan on the back!

• Regular Fit - Longline - Size up for lose fit.
• Heavy weight - 350 GSM
• Two Colours - Black and Blue Marle
• 80% Cotton, 20% Recycled Polyester Anti-Pill Fleece
• Pre-Shrunk to minimize shrinkage

title: Electronics Box Lid
body_html: Replacement lids are available for customers who have damaged their existing lid. Please email us first on support@foildrive.com to ensure a new lid is the correct solution for you.

title: Battery Checker
body_html:
Thanks to popular demand, the Battery Checker is a simple, compact device to check your battery percentages.

Take it to the water with you to check which over your batteries has the most charge, or use it at home to see if you've reached storage level without having to run down to your shed to plug it into your kit.

These are available for both the Assist and Assist PLUS and are not cross compatible. Whilst it wont hurt your battery or checker, the Assist PLUS checker wont display the correct information for an Assist battery, and vice versa.

In addition, these have been programmed to display voltages. Simply single press the power button once plugged in and it will toggle the display. This is useful for tech heads, and can be used if we need to troubleshoot with you.

title: Battery Checker
body_html:
Thanks to popular demand, the Battery Checker is a simple, compact device to check your battery percentages.

Take it to the water with you to check which over your batteries has the most charge, or use it at home to see if you've reached storage level without having to run down to your shed to plug it into your kit.

These are available for both the Assist and Assist PLUS and are not cross compatible. Whilst it wont hurt your battery or checker, the Assist PLUS checker wont display the correct information for an Assist battery, and vice versa.

In addition, these have been programmed to display voltages. Simply single press the power button once plugged in and it will toggle the display. This is useful for tech heads, and can be used if we need to troubleshoot with you.

title: Motor Protection Sticker
body_html:
Replacement sticker for the outer rotor of the standard v1 or v2 Foil Drive motor. For the High Power Motor Protection Sticker see SKU220

The sticker acts as an outer protection for the paint on the motor. If your sticker becomes torn or ripped, it is recommended you replace it to help protect your motor. It is a good idea to ensure the surface of the motor is in good condition before applying a new sticker. If your motor requires some refurbishing head to our Info Centre for options or instructions to do it yourself.

title: Foil Drive Gen1 LiPo Bag
body_html:
Lipo Bags can be used for transport, charging and storage of your Foil Drive Lithium Battery.

These bags are made of a fire retardant fibreglass, in the unlikely event your battery has an issue, it can help contain a fire or excessive heat. Its pretty much a fire blanket for your battery and is the best place to keep your battery. We recommend a separate bag for each battery, you may chose to add more to your collection!

 Dimensions: 400mm x 250mm

title: Parallel Y Lead for Small Batteries
body_html:
FOR USE WITH TWO SMALL 4.2ah BATTERIES FOR THE ASSIST PLUS ONLY!!!

With this Y Lead you can take 2x Small 4.2ah Batteries, join them together in parallel and enjoy your Assist PLUS with a medium capacity!

Want to take your Foil Drive Assist PLUS on holidays with you? With the Small Batteries being under the 160wh energy limit for airline travel, most airlines will allow 2 or 3 on board.

When using the Parallel Y Lead, it's very important to ensure you:

- Only ever connect 2x Small 4.2ah Batteries together.
- Both batteries must be fully charged 100% when connected. (+-5%)
- Batteries must be charged individually, do not leave 2x Small batteries connected with the Y lead when charging. Charge each battery 100% before re-connecting.
- When flying on airlines, all batteries must be disconnected and carried/packed appropriately
- No flatwater foiling allowed. You will simply drain your batteries too fast and degrade them much faster over time.

Important: When flying on your chosen airline, be sure to contact them well before you fly. Please read this article for further direction as to the limitations and safety processes to follow when flying - DG rules are taken extremely seriously and must not be broken.

title: Two Blade Hub
body_html:
Replacement Nylon Hub for Aluminium Propellers and Foil Drive Assist PLUS only!
Propellers not included.

title: Assist Battery 12ah Battery
body_html:
Additional or replacement Lithium-Ion battery for the Foil Drive Assist system only.

This product currently has a longer 3 week production lead time, please contact us for confirmation.

 

Grab another battery for when the waves keep pumping and you've got a little more to give! Paddle or motor back to the beach, grab a sip of water, refresh the zink, plug a fresh battery in and get back out there for round 2.

 

The battery is purpose designed, built, and tested especially for the Foil Drive Assist system. Every battery has been carefully manufactured and extensively tested in house, featuring a built-in Battery Management System (BMS) to ensure safety. The BMS manages the charge rate, balance of the individual cells, low and high voltage cutoff, internal resistance and temperature monitoring.

 

Each spare battery is shipped at storage voltage.

title: Assist PLUS 12.6ah Standard Battery
body_html:
Lithium-Ion battery for the Foil Drive Assist PLUS system only. Not compatible with Assist.

Standard 12.6ah Battery = 1.7kg
Small 4.2ah Battery = 0.6kg (Strictly no e-foiling)

Grab another battery for when the waves keep pumping and you've got a little more to give! Paddle or motor back to the beach, grab a sip of water, refresh the zink, plug a fresh battery in and get back out there for round 2.

The battery is purpose designed, built, and tested especially for the Foil Drive Assist system. Every battery has been carefully manufactured and extensively tested in house, featuring a built-in Battery Management System (BMS) to ensure safety. The BMS manages the charge rate, balance of the individual cells, low and high voltage cutoff, internal resistance and temperature monitoring.

If you are purchasing a new battery and have an existing charger, you may require a V2 Battery Adaptor Lead. We have changed the plugs on the V2 batteries so original V1 Charger require this adaptor lead, you can learn more and purchase one HERE

title: Assist PLUS Small 4.2ah Battery
body_html:
Additional Lithium-Ion battery for the Foil Drive Assist PLUS system only. Not compatible with Assist.

Standard 12.6ah Battery = 1.7kg
Small 4.2ah Battery = 0.6kg (Strictly no e-foiling)

The Small 4.2ah Battery is perfect for Wing Ding riders or competent Down Wind Foilers who want to reduce weight for pumping and turning and only need to use full power for very short periods to get up on foil.

Want to take your Foil Drive Assist PLUS on holidays with you? With the Small 4.2ah batteries, now you can! The Small Battery (120.9wh) is under the 160wh energy limit for airline travel.

Important: When flying on your chosen airline, be sure to contact them well before you fly. Please read this article for further direction as to the limitations and safety processes to follow when flying - DG rules are taken extremely seriously and must not be broken.

Grab one of our Small Battery Parallel Y Leads to join 2x Small 4.2ah Batteries together in parallel and enjoy your Assist PLUS with a medium capacity!

The battery is purpose designed, built, and tested especially for the Foil Drive Assist system. Every battery has been carefully manufactured and extensively tested in house, featuring a built-in Battery Management System (BMS) to ensure safety. The BMS manages the charge rate, balance of the individual cells, low and high voltage cut-off, internal resistance and temperature monitoring.

If you are purchasing a new battery and have an existing charger, you may require a V2 Battery Adaptor Lead. We have changed the plugs on the V2 batteries so original V1 Charger require this adaptor lead, you can learn more and purchase one HERE

title: Paddle Mount
body_html:
Control your Foil Drive from your paddle with our ergonomically designed Paddle Mount. 

These mounts easily install to your paddle and can be altered for both goofy and natural footed riders, simply switch the position of the removable wedge using your 2.5mm driver.

Whilst we have recommendations on positioning of the mount, everyone has a slightly different preference of where feels natural. You can mount for use with your top hand, or flip the controller upside down for use with your lower hand, halfway down the paddle.

__

You must apply 2 strips of electrical tape down the shaft of your paddle before installation. This is both to protect the surface, and to create a softer surface to the clamping force of the mount to grip to. The bolts only requiring finger tight tension to remain in position.


We recommend leaving the paddle mount slightly loose for the first few uses to allow for on water fine tuning of the position on the paddle.

 

ONLY AVAILABLE TO EXISTING FOIL DRIVE CUSTOMERS
Controller not included

Click here for instructions on fitting the paddle mount.

title: Additional Board Install Kit
body_html:
Have multiple boards or need to freshen up your existing installation? The Additional Board Install Kit includes everything you need to attach your electronics box to your board, and correctly secure the cable to your mast. 

Note: Pictures are out of date, the light grey mast cable guides are now made of a flexible rubber, one is provided in the kit.

title: Standard Plastic Propellers
body_html:
One pair of Standard Foil Drive Assist folding propellers. These propellers are the softest of them all, Durable or Aluminium Propellers may be better suited as a more durable option.

Only to be used with Durable Hub, not Nylon Hub.
Only Compatible with Gen1 Foil Drive Assist

title: Durable Plastic Propellers
body_html:
One pair of Durable Foil Drive Assist folding propellers. These propellers are more durable than the Standard Propellers but offer more Durability. Standard or Aluminium Propellers may be better suited.

Only available to existing Foil Drive Customers.
Only to be used with Durable Hub, not Nylon Hub.
Only Compatible with Gen1 Foil Drive Assist

title: Two Blade Propeller Hub Set
body_html:
Looking to reach maximum performance, durability and style? The Aluminium Propellers are the ultimate upgrade. These 5 Axis CNC Machined blades increase the usability of your Foil Drive™ Assist PLUS thanks to their refined shape, thinner, stronger and sleeker design.

Ultimate durability comes from the stiffness, preventing flex when under load and providing an increase in thrust and torque throughout the power range. Durability being incredibly important when offshore, never to be left with a damaged prop due to debris.
For ultimate performance, these propellers must only be used with the included Nylon Hub, designed to further improve hydrodynamics as water passes over the motor can, and through the blades.

Note:
- Not compatible with Foil Drive Assist. While they do fit, these propellers require the higher RMP of the Assist PLUS or Gen2 systems in order to improve performance.

title: 3M Dual Lock
body_html:
3M Dual Lock Strips secure the Foil Drive™ Electronics Box to your board or Foil Drive™ Mounting Base Plate. Whilst all kits and Base Plates come with 3M Dual Lock ready to install, add these to your kit as spares or for additional board use.

To apply new Dual Lock, first attach the new Dual Lock to the existing pieces on your Electronics Box/Base Plate to ensure alignment. Clean and dry, free from any oils you may have used to clean. Peel the tape off the Dual lock to expose the adhesive backing (Do not touch the adhesive), and press your Electronics Box down firmly on to the prepared surface. You will need to press down for 30 seconds, enabling the surfaces to bond.

If you are wanting more Dual Lock for a secondary board, take a look at our Additional Board Install Kit.

title: Rubber Mast Cable Guides
body_html: Additional or replacement Rubber Mast Cable Guides for securing your motor cable to the trailing edge of your mast. These are super important in order to maintain a streamline finish, longer masts may require additional guides.

title: Board Cable Guides
body_html: Board Cable Guides adhere to your board and hold the cable in place. If you have a longer cable length additional Board Cable Guides may be required to secure the whole length of your cable onto your board.

title: 2.5mm Hex Driver
body_html:
Whilst every Foil Drive™ kit comes with a driver, we’ve all got tools that go missing! Grab a spare, or replace your old driver that may have seen a little too much salt water. 

Top Tip: You can adjust the tightens of the head in the handle using the locator pin on the side of the handle.

title: Foil Drive 28v Battery Charger - Assist PLUS
body_html:
110-240v Lithium Battery Charger for your Foil Drive Assist PLUS Battery.

Please select correct charger to suit your battery - This charger is for 28v Batteries ONLY

Assist PLUS battery requires a 28v charger.

Chargers are available in both AU or a US plug type, please specify which you require. EU or EU customers can purchase this product variant.

Do not use other chargers with your Foil Drive Batteries, do not modify the battery or charger in any way.

Chargers now have a V2 Battery Adaptor Heat Shrunk on the connection end. If you have a V1 Assist PLUS battery and require a new charger, this adaptor can simply be removed to reveal the V1 plug type.

Click here for more information on how to charge your Foil Drive battery.

title: Foil Drive 28v Battery Charger - Assist PLUS
body_html:
110-240v Lithium Battery Charger for your Foil Drive Assist PLUS Battery.

Please select correct charger to suit your battery - This charger is for 28v Batteries ONLY

Assist PLUS battery requires a 28v charger.

Chargers are available in both AU or a US plug type, please specify which you require. EU or EU customers can purchase this product variant.

Do not use other chargers with your Foil Drive Batteries, do not modify the battery or charger in any way.

Chargers now have a V2 Battery Adaptor Heat Shrunk on the connection end. If you have a V1 Assist PLUS battery and require a new charger, this adaptor can simply be removed to reveal the V1 plug type.

Click here for more information on how to charge your Foil Drive battery.

title: V2 Foil Drive Throttle Controller
body_html:
With the new higher powered Foil Drive v2 controller, the wireless signal strength between the hand controller and the box is greatly improved. In choppy conditions or with lower volume boards, this results in a much more reliable connection.

Read more about it here! V2 Wireless Controller - What's New!

Spare or Replacement Wireless Throttle Controller Kit for Assist and Assist PLUS.
Please note Assist Kits cannot access the telemetry data available in new controllers as they do not have the abilities build in to the kit. 

Pairing a new controller to your existing kit is super simple, follow this article on our help center. Pairing the Controller

title: Durable Hub - Plastic Props Only
body_html:
The durable hub is specifically for plastic props, either Standard, or Durable propellers.
If you plan to foil in debris heavy waters, we recommend having a spare hub in your kit!

This hub cannot be used with Aluminium Propellers.
Propellers not included.

Only Compatible with Gen1 Foil Drive Assist

title: v1 Motor Puck
body_html:
Motor Puck are compatible with both the Assist and Assist PLUS and come with the necessary hardware and heatsink for installation. Please follow the instructional video provided with your replacement puck.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Compatible with Universal Pod ONLY. This puck is not compatible with 3D printed pods. Please email support@foildrive.com if you have this style pod and require a new puck.

title: Cover & Battery Monitor
body_html:
Replacement electronics cover for Foil Drive Assist or Assist PLUS, please specify.

Comes with battery monitor screen and pig tail lead ready to be plugged in. Please be aware of of the antenna, screen power lead and main power lead when removing and installing covers.

title: Cover & Battery Monitor
body_html:
Replacement electronics cover for Foil Drive Assist or Assist PLUS, please specify.

Comes with battery monitor screen and pig tail lead ready to be plugged in. Please be aware of of the antenna, screen power lead and main power lead when removing and installing covers.

title: Cable Gland
body_html:
Replacement or Spare Stainless Steel Cable Gland For Foil Drive Assist or Assist PLUS.
This kit comes with both the external, stainless steel components, and the internal rubber seals. It is imperative these are installed in the correct order and orientation as per the second image.

title: Dual Wall Glue Heatshrink Kit
body_html: While most of our replacement kits come with heatshrink where needed, you may like to add some extras to your cart just in case!

title: V2 Box Latch Protectors - Foil Drive Gen1
body_html:
V2 Latch Protectors for your Foil Drive Assist and Assist PLUS, with an improved locking mechanism for fail-safe protection.

Simply crack off the old ones if required, sand back any residual glue and clean the surface with an isopropyl alcohol. Once dry, use super glue to stick the new latch protectors on!

title: Foil Drive™ Cap
body_html: Foil Drive Truckers Cap for those long summer days out flying, tried and tested to stay on in the water!

title: Foil Drive Bumper Sticker (3 Pack)
body_html:
High tack gloss vinyl sticker to represent Foil Drive on your board, car, laptop, cat* or anywhere that stickers normally go.

 

Dimensions: 20cm x 3cm
*Although these stickers will stick to your cat very well, we do not recommend it at all...

title: Foil Drive™ Slim Stubby Cooler
body_html: The Foil Drive Stubby Cooler fits over your motor can and propellers for protection in transit, or to keep a beer cold!
